timeline.message: DDF-5946 Use unique id for metacard owner and permissions
DDF-5946 Remove guest claims before selecting subject identifier
DDF-5946 Remove guest claims before selecting subject identifier

timeline.bodyText: ✏️ I was a little confused by what the getSubjectAttribute method is doing. It might be useful to rename that method to something like getSubjectIdentityAttribute.
timeline.author: bakejeyner

replies.bodyText: I don't disagree, but it's like this in the later DDF versions too, so I'm going to keep it as-is for consistency
replies.author: SmithJosh
